description:
Upload Remote is a cross-platform file sharing application that enables fast and secure file transfers between computers, phones, and tablets.

Upload Remote is a cross-platform file sharing application that enables fast and secure file transfers between computers, phones, and tablets. It connects devices over a local network or Wi-Fi, using 100% secure end-to-end encryption. The data is stored exclusively on users' devices — never uploaded to any external servers or databases. Upload Remote supports Android, iOS, Mac, and Windows.

To start using Upload Remote, install it on two or more devices — PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, any Android phone or tablet.
